name.ja: <ruby>黒智天至<rt>ヘルヴィダム</rt></ruby>イリスフィール
name.zh-CN: 黑智天至 伊莉斯菲尔

text.en:
2 Level 8 monsters
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Cherubidamn Irisfiel" by using 1 Xyz Monster you control that has not activated its effect in the Monster Zone this turn (transfer its materials.) If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can activate this effect; this turn, Xyz Monsters you control gain ATK equal to their own Rank x 100 during the Battle Phase only. If this card would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can detach 1 material from a monster you control instead. You can only use this effect of "Cherubidamn Irisfiel" once per turn.
